messages.content: Not everyone was as fortunate as me. That’s why I got involved in politics, and after 12 years as a Tooting councillor, ran for Parliament in 2005. I’m proud to stand for re-election on my record. There’s lots I still want to do to improve our area; some of my ideas are set out inside.

mentions.candidate: Sadiq's proved himself to be friendly, honest and hard working – he’s not in it for himself.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Compare that to the Tories who say they want new bus services whilst actually cutting them – that just doesn’t add up.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born at St George’s Hospital and grew up on an Earlsfield council estate. I went to state schools in Tooting - just as my daughters do now. I’ve lived here all my life.

politicalExperience.achievements: Got involved in politics, ran for Parliament in 2005.

endorsements.endorsement: Taxi drivers don’t often have a good word to say about politicians. But Sadiq’s different.

quotes.text: He’s Tooting through and through – he understands local issues because he is local. He shares the values that make this such a great place to live.
His experience as a local councillor and on the national stage means he really gets things done. He knows the key people, both here and in the corridors of power.

images.caption: Sadiq Khan, with a folded-arm pose.
Local resident Richard Cudlip standing with a sign stating 'Sadiq is our local choice'.
